subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk scored the only goal of the shootout, and goaltender Martin Brodeur made three critical stops to lift the Devils over the first-place Rangers for the first time this season.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk scored the only goal of the shootout, and goaltender Martin Brodeur made three critical stops to lift the Devils over the first-place Rangers for the first time this season.
